instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message: Have iMac 21.5 with 216-0810001. Without GFX power and mouse is on. So I suspect GFX or chip problems. Can I put another GPU?

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message:
Dell M5950 card with a modified VBIOS. With these cards it is not the GPU at fault it is a strange power issue that I have not found the solution to. 
Get an M5950 card and ask me for the VBIOS in private.

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message: I removed the 0001 chip and now power. Should I place new chip to try?

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message: Whatever, ignore what I said and waste time.....

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message: With 0005 works well. I just replaced and all seems ok.

threads.title: 216-0810001 problem
threads.message: Yup, just wait for it to come back.....

threads.message: Oo, you mean some componnt react with the heat? This will be headache, yes.
